name: Lootland - arcade shooter
description:
Enter a world where strange mutation is turning people into monsters! You are an unlikely Hero, tasked with pushing back the monster invasion! Take to the streets and blast away waves of enemies using the simple one-finger controls. Use the environment to your advantage and see if you’ve got what it takes to clear the streets!

SIMPLE CONTROLS
Use a single finger! Drag to move, release to shoot!

DOZENS OF SKILLS
Select best skills for your hero when you level up!

UNIQUE ENEMIES
Learn how the enemies behave to outsmart and outgun them!

PAINT THE STREETS
Have fun turning the streets into gooey art!
